education_text.0: Shaw earned a bachelor's degree      Latin honors summa cum laude from the      University of California, San Diego University of California, San Diego, a PhD from      Stanford University Stanford University in 1980, and then became an assistant professor of the department of computer science at      Columbia University Columbia UniversityShaw earned a bachelor's degree      Latin honors summa cum laude from the      University of California, San Diego University of California, San Diego, a PhD from      Stanford University Stanford University in 1980, and then became an assistant professor of the department of computer science at      Columbia University Columbia University
